projects.description: Classic game of Hangman. Available only in Spanish. Use an API that generates random words. The game is responsive, and it is available for mobile devices. Counts with a dark mode.
Aerolab challenge. A web application that allows users to redeem points for products. The application is responsive, and it is available for mobile devices.
App to calculate the inflation of Argentina in a given period of time, based on official data. The app is responsive, and it is available for mobile devices.
App to calculate your profit or loss in a given period of time, based on the price of a cryptocurrency. The app is responsive, and it is available for mobile devices.

Open source contribution to Langchain, integrating Typesense as a vector store to save, update, delete and search vectors, providing a fast and scalable way to use this search engine to do a similarity search.
Landing page of Alta tinta, a business that offers printing services.
Landing page of La Paster√≠a de Ale, a business that offers pasta.
